name: Hand-e-capped
description: My submission for Mark Brown's 2019 Game Jam where the theme is "Only one." This game is a platformer/shooter where the action fits on only one screen, the player has only one health, has to survive for only one minute, and most uniquely, can use only one hand. Constantly having to aim with the mouse, fire with the 'f' key, run around with the arrows and swap weapons using 1 2 3 and 4 keeps the players hand constantly jumping from place to place in a desperate attempt to survive only one more second. With only one hand, it's surely a game that plays like no other.
